name: Jackett
short_description: API proxy for torrent trackers with Sonarr/Radarr support.
description: API proxy for torrent trackers with Sonarr/Radarr support. Jackett is a self-hosted application focused on media, tools, utility, torrent. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose. It supports a wide range of use cases for homelabs and self-hosted infrastructure.
usecases: Self-host Jackett on your home server to api proxy for torrent trackers with sonarr/radarr support without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Jackett to manage your media workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
